feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: input-output-hk/cardano-config
entry.summary:
Cardano Configuration

DEPRECATED please don't use this package directly. See cardano-node or cardano-db-sync as the only places that used this functionality.

This package exposes functions to provide git information for Cardano tooling.

Cardano tools support building via nix and cabal.

When building with nix the git executable and git metadata isn't available so the git revision is embedded as a series of 40 zeros during the build. After the nix build is finished the executable is patched with the correct git sha. See set-git-rev.hs

For cabal the Template Haskell function gitRev executes in the context of the current git checkout, requiring the git executable and git metadata is available at compile time. This fails on cross-compiling ARM executables, for cross-compiling use nix.

To use this library copy the Cardano.Config.Git.Rev module into the desired cli project and setup nix to use set-git-rev.hs.
